author: nicko
msg: Changed to use GetRepository rather than GetLoggerRepository

author: nicko
msg: Updated log4net.build to not specify file excludes for specific platforms.
Updated code files to use C# preprocessor defines to conditionaly exclude the contents of some files from some of the builds.
This improves the visability of the exclusions and reduces the maintanence of the nant build file.

author: nicko
msg: Updated help in build.cmd. Added -? option that displays the command line syntax.
Changed build.cmd to look for NAnt in the PATH and give a usefull error message if it cannot be found.

author: nicko
msg: Added nant build file for tests. Only allows building on net-1.0 and net-1.1. Allows NUnit test to be run on net-1.0.
